A novel URL Shortcut Tool

Welcome!! This is REWQ - a very simple idea. It is a shortcut url for any longer url.

R_E_W_Q are top 4 letters on your keyboard and you can kind of swipe to enter them.

Whenever, you swipe on your keyboard these 4 letters 'r-e-w-q-TAB' - we will redirect you to the link from below.

Destination Links

Enable Destination URL Note Reset

Click on save button and reopen the URL rewq.netlify.app (by swiping r_e_w_q) on a new tab to be redirected to your favorite URLs.
